column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your review of Jinya Ramen Bar.  If ever your ramen isn't to your liking
column2: always send it back and we can either remake it or you have the option to order a different ramen to your liking.  My motto has always been "If not GREAT
column3: REMAKE".  Japanese ramen and appetizers will lean toward the high sodium side as many of our dishes have soy sauce as one of its ingredients.  That being said
column4: you are always welcome to let your server know you want "less salt" in your ramen and we will be glad to accommodate you.  We know here at Jinya
column5: we will never be all things to all people
column6: but we do the best we can to meet each and every customers' expectations.
